document.full_text: travis buck hit his first home run in 13 months to give the cleveland indians a 2-1 win over the cincinnati reds in front of a delighted sold out crowd in ohio on saturday.
document.title: timely buck homer gives indians win over reds
lines_and_colors: travis buck hit his first home run in 13 months to give the cleveland indians a 2-1 win over the cincinnati reds in front of a delighted sold out crowd in ohio on saturday.
